TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Yasu-zen, title = Yasu-zen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yasu-zen} }

S.FORM: == Yasu-zen亞述人 == Yasu-zen " Yala-mu-yi "ܥܡܐ ܐܬܘܪܝܐ, Sipulay-ye "אשורים, Alapuo-yi " الآشوريون‎, pangangan han tu Siliya-zen "Syriaca", itida maudip i Siya nu tusaay a sawacan amisan nu binacadan, u Alade-zen a kakenihan. i sumamad, kamu nuheni u Akate-yi ku tade kamu nuheni, dikudan sa u Alami-yi. Yasu-zen itida i Siya makaala tu sepat a malebutan nu mahcaan nuheni. nu sumamaday a zitay nu Yasu-zen u hitay ku kaadihan, hina pacaw ku nuheni, milauyt tu Yahua a Yasu-tikuo kaadihan i tawya. nikudan idawtu ku midebungay tu nuhenian sisa haymaw satu caay pisatahaw ku nuheni. 亞述人 ,又稱敘利亞人(Syriacs), . sakaetiman概要 kunyun nu ayawan a caysip nu sici atu nu ayawan a cacay a bataan nu seci, mikuwanay nu Miesu-puta-miya a Yasu-zen a lalangawan atu palutatengaan tu tidaay a tademaw patina. namaka kunyun nu ayawan tu nemsep-siw mihcaan malawpes tu ku Siyasu-di'kuo, nikudan satu u Yasu-zen kuwanen tu nu katuuday a kanatalan sayaway sa u Sinpapi-lundi-kuo, Puose-dikuo, Sila-zen atu Luoma-dikuo. itini ayawan nu tulu a secian, Yasu-zen palutatengaan nu heni u Asue-sen " Ashur", nikudan sumad han nuheni tu Citu-ciw. . cun seci Alapuo-dikuo misaahebal katukuh i Minsuputa-miya amisa sa, caay palutatengan tu Yiselan-ciw a Yasu-zen u sasawacuen ku nuehni. ayda a Tue-ci E'tuman-dikuo mikuwan tu nikudan, muenengay i tidaay nu Yasu-zen palutatengan tu cituciw, malecad atu Yamin Niya-zen, patayen nu Tueci E'tuman ku hatidaay nu tademawan, katuud ku tademaw nu Yasu-zen malingatu tu mihinang misatadas aca tu kakitidaan, idaw ku adidiay nu Yasiya " aydaay nu Tue'-ci" a Yasu-zin haymaw sa mawada ku tademaw. maedis ku Yasu-zen atu malepacaw, namaka caysiw a seci tu hedek katukuh tu tusep nu linatu a secian nu kitakidan mapabulasak tu namin. . aydaay nu Yasu-zen當代亞述人 aydaay nu Yasu-zen i Cuntun kitidaan a tademaw u iluc nu Ku-Yasu-zen a Citu-tu, ayda, pulung nu kanatal makaala tu tusep-sep nu pinaay a wan nu Yasu-zen. Yasu-zen itini i siya kitidaan a Yila-ke' amisan, Sili-ya, Yilan nutipan atu Lipa-nen atu Yedan idaw henay ku katuuday nu tademawan. itida i Tue-ci wali nutipan idaw henay ku pinaay a tademawan nu Yasu-zen. Yela-ke' u Yasu-zen a tatapangan nu kitidaan, sayadahay nu pulung nu kitakidan a Yasu-zen kitidaan. . nika itini i tusep-seplu mihcaan palekal ku Amilika tu sakalepacawan tu Yila-ke' kilul sa malawlaw tu namin ku katuuday, hatudaaytu nu Yasu-zen hida satu mabulaw, mabulaw taydan i biyaw a kanatalan atu tayda i nu dumaan a kanatalan, Yila-ke' nu Yasu-zen mawada' tu pankiw nu tademawan, i Sili-ya, Yedan, Amilika atu Zuydin a kanatalan ayda nu pina nu mihcaan yadahyadah ku tademaw nu Yasu-zen. Amilika a Dite'liu atu Zuydin a Nantayli-ya idaw ku namaka Cuntun a Yasu-zen nu namaka tabakiay a niyaduan, idaw ku nipatideng nuheni tu kiwkay, patiyamay, tataydaan midang a kitidaan. . palutatengaan u kilisetu信仰基督教 ayda palutatengan nu Yasu-zen u Tunha-yasu-kiwkay, Ciasedin-li-tencuciw atu Siliya-cenciw-huy. idaw henay ku caayay ka hacica nu tademawan musakamu tu Kuala-miyi nisumadan tu aydaay nu sasakamuen tu Aalmiyi " Neo-Aramaic", sakamusa ku nuheni u Sinya-suyi "Neo-Assyrian". ayda nina Yasu-zen idaw henay ku nipiliwan tu lisi nu sumamaday a sasalisinan. hata nu Yasu-zen uhenitu ku patucekay tu hata nuheni, uyda a hataan u mabulasakay nu Yasu-zen a kanatal nu hataan. (Neo-Aramaic),他們稱為新亞述語(Neo-Assyrian). . idaw ku miduducay Yasu-zen nu ilucan tu palutatengaan tu Yeselan-ciw, nganganan u Muhala-mizin " Mhallami". i Siliya atu Liapnen kitidaan, itidaay a tademaw idaw henay ku iluc nu Alami-zen " si nganganan tu Yalin-zen", palutatengaan nuheni tu u Citu-ciw, sakay kiwkay nu sasakamuen nuheni u Alami-yi. ayda iluc nu Alami-zen atu aydaay nu Yasu-zen matinengay hakiya u malecaday ku nuheni a binacadan. kinlaw henay tu nuhenian ayda. (Mhallami). .

== Yaso-zen亞述人 == Yaso-zen " Yala-mo-yi "ܥܡܐ ܐܬܘܪܝܐ, Sipolay-ye "אשורים, Alapoo-yi " الآشوريون‎, pangangan han to Siliya-zen "Syriaca", itida maodip i Siya no tosaay a sawacan amisan no binacadan, o Alade-zen a kakenihan. i somamad, kamo noheni o Akate-yi ko tade kamo noheni, dikodan sa o Alami-yi. Yaso-zen itida i Siya makaala to sepat a malebotan no mahcaan noheni. no somamaday a zitay no Yaso-zen o hitay ko kaadihan, hina pacaw ko noheni, milaoyt to Yahoa a Yaso-tikoo kaadihan i tawya. nikodan idawto ko midebongay to nohenian sisa haymaw sato caay pisatahaw ko noheni. 亞述人 ,又稱敘利亞人(Syriacs), . sakaetiman概要 konyon no ayawan a caysip no sici ato no ayawan a cacay a bataan no seci, mikowanay no Mieso-pota-miya a Yaso-zen a lalangawan ato palotatengaan to tidaay a tademaw patina. namaka konyon no ayawan to nemsep-siw mihcaan malawpes to ko Siyaso-di'koo, nikodan sato o Yaso-zen kowanen to no katooday a kanatalan sayaway sa o Sinpapi-londi-koo, Poose-dikoo, Sila-zen ato Looma-dikoo. itini ayawan no tolo a secian, Yaso-zen palotatengaan no heni o Asoe-sen " Ashor", nikodan somad han noheni to Cito-ciw. . con seci Alapoo-dikoo misaahebal katokoh i Minsopota-miya amisa sa, caay palotatengan to Yiselan-ciw a Yaso-zen o sasawacoen ko noehni. ayda a Toe-ci E'toman-dikoo mikowan to nikodan, moenengay i tidaay no Yaso-zen palotatengan to citociw, malecad ato Yamin Niya-zen, patayen no Toeci E'toman ko hatidaay no tademawan, katood ko tademaw no Yaso-zen malingato to mihinang misatadas aca to kakitidaan, idaw ko adidiay no Yasiya " aydaay no Toe'-ci" a Yaso-zin haymaw sa mawada ko tademaw. maedis ko Yaso-zen ato malepacaw, namaka caysiw a seci to hedek katokoh to tosep no linato a secian no kitakidan mapabolasak to namin. . aydaay no Yaso-zen當代亞述人 aydaay no Yaso-zen i Conton kitidaan a tademaw o iloc no Ko-Yaso-zen a Cito-to, ayda, polong no kanatal makaala to tosep-sep no pinaay a wan no Yaso-zen. Yaso-zen itini i siya kitidaan a Yila-ke' amisan, Sili-ya, Yilan notipan ato Lipa-nen ato Yedan idaw henay ko katooday no tademawan. itida i Toe-ci wali notipan idaw henay ko pinaay a tademawan no Yaso-zen. Yela-ke' o Yaso-zen a tatapangan no kitidaan, sayadahay no polong no kitakidan a Yaso-zen kitidaan. . nika itini i tosep-seplo mihcaan palekal ko Amilika to sakalepacawan to Yila-ke' kilol sa malawlaw to namin ko katooday, hatodaayto no Yaso-zen hida sato mabolaw, mabolaw taydan i biyaw a kanatalan ato tayda i no domaan a kanatalan, Yila-ke' no Yaso-zen mawada' to pankiw no tademawan, i Sili-ya, Yedan, Amilika ato Zoydin a kanatalan ayda no pina no mihcaan yadahyadah ko tademaw no Yaso-zen. Amilika a Dite'lio ato Zoydin a Nantayli-ya idaw ko namaka Conton a Yaso-zen no namaka tabakiay a niyadoan, idaw ko nipatideng noheni to kiwkay, patiyamay, tataydaan midang a kitidaan. . palotatengaan o kiliseto信仰基督教 ayda palotatengan no Yaso-zen o Tonha-yaso-kiwkay, Ciasedin-li-tencociw ato Siliya-cenciw-hoy. idaw henay ko caayay ka hacica no tademawan mosakamo to Koala-miyi nisomadan to aydaay no sasakamoen to Aalmiyi " Neo-Aramaic", sakamosa ko noheni o Sinya-soyi "Neo-Assyrian". ayda nina Yaso-zen idaw henay ko nipiliwan to lisi no somamaday a sasalisinan. hata no Yaso-zen ohenito ko patocekay to hata noheni, oyda a hataan o mabolasakay no Yaso-zen a kanatal no hataan. (Neo-Aramaic),他們稱為新亞述語(Neo-Assyrian). . idaw ko midodocay Yaso-zen no ilocan to palotatengaan to Yeselan-ciw, nganganan o Mohala-mizin " Mhallami". i Siliya ato Liapnen kitidaan, itidaay a tademaw idaw henay ko iloc no Alami-zen " si nganganan to Yalin-zen", palotatengaan noheni to o Cito-ciw, sakay kiwkay no sasakamoen noheni o Alami-yi. ayda iloc no Alami-zen ato aydaay no Yaso-zen matinengay hakiya o malecaday ko noheni a binacadan. kinlaw henay to nohenian ayda. (Mhallami). .
